alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 12:52PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida and south central Georgia, including the following counties, in Big Bend Florida, Jefferson and Madison. In south central Georgia, Brooks. * WHEN...Until 400 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1251 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Greenville, Aucilla, Ashville, Ebb, Sirmans, Lovett, Lamont, Hamburg and Empress. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
